content.html: But you _can_ drag & drop PDFs into your collection which achieves almost the same thing. Some quirks still require getting used to, but I'm happy so far. @zotero couldn't have timed this release any better. Also importing from Mendeley was a breeze. Bye bye @mendeley_com.
content.text: But you _can_ drag & drop PDFs into your collection which achieves almost the same thing. Some quirks still require getting used to, but I'm happy so far. @zotero couldn't have timed this release any better. Also importing from Mendeley was a breeze. Bye bye @mendeley_com.
